Description: Unique ID for each transaction (Primary Key).
Raw text location for the branch.
Boolean flag: TRUE if the transaction is tied to the Killeen/Fort Hood area (Standardized).
Date the transaction occurred. Parsed from raw timestamp.
Time the transaction occurred. Parsed from raw timestamp.
Type of fee-inducing transaction (e.g., ACH\_DEBIT, POS\_PURCHASE). Standardized (UPPERCASE).
Type of fee assessed (NSF, OVERDRAFT). Standardized (UPPERCASE).
The cleaned numeric dollar amount of the fee. Extracted from raw string and cast to numeric (BIGNUMERIC).
Boolean flag: TRUE if the fee was later reversed/waived. Converted from raw integer flag.
The reason for reversal: (CUST\_DISPUTE\_24H\_CURE, FRAUD\_CLAIM, GOODWILL\_WAIVER, NONE).
The fee policy in effect at the time (V1\_STRICT, V2\_24H\_CURE).
